code.description:
A tiny string  
Minimum length of 0 and a maximum length of 32

name.description:
A tiny string  
Minimum length of 0 and a maximum length of 32

description.description:
A long string  
Minimum length of 0 and a maximum length of 4096

BasicPropertyInfo_Simple.description:
A short string  
Minimum length of 0 and a maximum length of 128

code.description: Uniquely identifies a single property for a reservation.

name.description: Specifies the proper name of the property.

cityCode.description: Specifies the three character IATA city code.

chainName.description: Specifies the proper name of the chain.

brandCode.description: Identifies a brand with in a chain (e.g. Courtyard, Hampton Inn).  This code is optional if the hotel is an independent property that can be identified by a propert code alone.

brandName.description: Identifies the proper name of the brand.

code.description: Used to identify this product programmatically.  EG "F" for First Class

count.description: Number available for sale or that have been sold

name.description: Display name for this product.  EG "First Class"

GuestCount.description: Identifies the number of guests for the reservation.

ageQualifyingCode.description: Specifies the age type of the guest.  (e.g. Adult, Child, Infant).

age.description: Specifies the specific age of the guest.

code.description:
A tiny string  
Minimum length of 0 and a maximum length of 32

Meal_Simple.description:
A short string  
Minimum length of 0 and a maximum length of 128

MealsIncluded.description: Specifies which meals are included with this rate plan.

mealPlanCodes.description: Identifies the type of meal plans included with this rate plan.

breakfastInd.description: When true, indicates that breakfast is included with this rate plan.

lunchInd.description: When true, indicates that lunch is included with this rate plan.

dinnerInd.description: When true, indicates dinner is included with this rate plan.

Identifier.description:
Identifier provides the ability to create a globally unique identifier. For the identifier to be globally unique it must have a system provided identifier and the system must be identified using a global naming authority. System identification uses the domain naming system (DNS) to assure they are globally unique and should be an URL. The system provided ID will typically be a primary or surrogate key in a database.

The URL, system and company attributes can be omitted only when the system context can be implied by a parent or ancestor element.

RatePlanID.description: Specifies information regarding a rate plan.

RatePlan.description: Specifies information regarding a rate plan.

ratePlanCode.description: Specifies the code that identifies this rate plan.

RatePlanDetail.description: Specifies information regarding a rate plan.

Comments.description: Specifies information regarding this rate plan.

MealsIncluded.description: Specifies the meals that are included with this rate plan.

code.description:
A tiny string  
Minimum length of 0 and a maximum length of 32

name.description:
A short string  
Minimum length of 0 and a maximum length of 128

description.description:
A long string  
Minimum length of 0 and a maximum length of 4096

RoomRateID.description: Specifies the details of a room rate.

RoomRate.description: Specifies the details of a room rate.

effectiveDate.description: Specifies the starting date for this room rate.

expireDate.description: Specifies the end date for this room rate.

Rate2.description: Specifies the rate for the room.

BasicPropertyInfo.description: Specifies the property for the reservation.

expireDateExclusiveInd.description: When true, the ExpireDate is the first day after the applicable period (e.g. when expire date is Oct 15  the last date of the period is Oct 14).

RoomRateDetail.description: Specifies the details of a room rate.

promotionCode.description: Identifyies host to link directly with a specific named advertising campaign. By including the code, the client is able to gain access to special offers which MAY have been created for a specifically targeted group via a CRM system or for a wider advertising campaign using Television or press adverts.

ratePlanCode.description: Specifies the rate plan code for the product.

roomTypeCode.description: Specifies the system room type code (ex: A1K, A1Q).

RoomRateQueryRange.description: Specifies the details of a room rate.

StartRate.description: Starting price for the rate range query.

EndRate.description: Ending price for the rate range query.

id.description: The ID for a room stay product.

BasicPropertyInfo.description: Identifies the property for the room stay.

arrivalDate.description: Specifies the arrival date for the query.

departureDate.description: Specifies the departure date for the query.

BasicPropertyInfo.description: Specifies property information for the query.

ArrivalDepartureDates.description: Identifies the start and/or end dates.

BasicPropertyInfo.description: Identifies a specific hotel or city for which the availability search applies.

GuestCount.description: Identifies the number of guests and the ages of the guests.

RoomRateQueryRange.description: The rate range for the query.

RoomTypeID.description: Specifies the details of the room type.

RoomType.description: Specifies the details of the room type.

roomTypeCode.description: Identifies the specific system room type code for this room type (e.g. A1K, A1Q).

bedTypeCode.description: Indicates the type of bed(s) found in the room. Typical values would be Double, Twin, Queen, or King.

Comments.description: Specifies information regarding the room type.

nonSmokingInd.description: When true indicates that the room type is non-smoking.

departureDateTime.description:
ISO date time type without UTC offset or Z for Zulu restriction indicating it is representing Local Time
Example: 2010-12-31T11:55:00

arrivalDateTime.description:
ISO date time type without UTC offset or Z for Zulu restriction indicating it is representing Local Time
Example: 2010-12-31T11:55:00
